name: Night Watchers
description:
this game heavily inspired by I'm on Observation Duty 3

BUT 2D version and less of Jumpscare, 

Just focus on finding anomaly 

Control:

ARROW KEY/WASD - MOVE

E - INTERACT

F - TURN ON/OFF FLASHLIGHT

SPACE - TAKE A PHOTO

Instruction:

You Need To remember every object in each room,

when you found an Anomaly TAKE A PHOTO on that object

Asset from:

https://limezu.itch.io/moderninteriors - LimeZu
